comments.author: Andi Vajda
comments.body:
Created an attachment (id=13077)
patch for Searcher.java

comments.author: cutting@apache.org
comments.body:
All patches should reference a GCJ bug # in a comment, e.g.,

/* Patched for GCJ to work around GCJ bug #15411.
 * http://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15411
 */
 ....
/* End patch for GCJ bug #15411. */

That way folks can easily check to see when the GCJ bug is fixed in a major
release, and then remove the workaround code.

description:
In order to workaround http://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15411 the
attached patch is necessary.
